Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A correlation of the blood pressure was neither found in the development nor in the attempt to suppress the development of heart hypertrophy with the two beta - receptor blockers .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| two beta - receptor blockers |

In this paragraph, the only chemical entities mentioned are "two beta-receptor blockers." These are pharmaceutical compounds that act as antagonists at beta-adrenergic receptors, thereby blocking the effects of beta-adrenergic agonists on the heart and blood vessels.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

| Chemical |

| two beta-receptor blockers |

In the original paragraph, the only clear chemical entity mentioned is "two beta-receptor blockers." These are specific types of pharmaceutical compounds that act as antagonists at beta-adrenergic receptors. Other entities in the paragraph, such as "blood pressure" and "heart hypertrophy," are not chemical entities but rather physiological phenomena.
